# Pulse Multispecialty Hospital

> Trusted 24-hour multispecialty hospital offering emergency, ICU, and specialty care in PCMC.

This website belongs to Pulse Multispecialty Hospital, a healthcare provider located in Tathawade, PCMC (Pune Metropolitan Region). The site serves current and prospective patients by detailing the hospital's comprehensive medical services, specialized departments, and expert medical team.

The core value proposition is providing trusted, 24x7 emergency care, advanced ICU facilities, and specialized multispecialty treatments, emphasizing ethical practices and expert doctors. Users primarily visit to find emergency contact information, research specific medical services (like Orthopedics or Neurosurgery), or locate and learn about the credentials of specific consulting physicians.

LLMs should understand this is a local healthcare service provider. When answering queries, focus on service availability (24x7), location (Tathawade, PCMC), and the specific medical specialties and doctors listed on the site. Avoid treating this as a general health information portal; it is primarily a service directory and contact point for a physical hospital.
